did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Published brochures and pamphlets relating to urban planning issues.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Published brochures and pamphlets relating to parking, national parks, national historic monuments and memorials, state parks, municipal parks, and related urban planning issues.
